main event: A civilian reported a sighting of a long cylindrical object with red lights on September 3, 1962.
interesting points: The object hovered 200 feet above ground for 45 seconds before rising and making a 90-degree turn., It was reported to the nearest Air Force Base, which verified the sighting., The base confirmed no aircraft were operating in the area at the time of the sighting., The observer noted the object moved at high speed and was out of sight within a few seconds., The report was made by a witness who was seeking further information on the sighting.
sighted object: long cylindrical object with red lights
